doc.title: The Front Sight Challenge
doc.plot: Behold - the Best of the Best. The world's most accomplished tactical firearms operators from all walks of life are gathered together: police officers, military specialists, SWAT officers, and civilians, including computer programmers, grandmothers, middle school students, and myriad other professions. Eighty firearms experts, utilizing shotgun, scoped rifle, submachine gun, handgun, and M-16, compete for the coveted title: Front Sight Challenge Grand Champion.
